important_notes.data_endpoint_issue: Graph data often ends before the x-axis boundary. Average data ends at 77.9% of the x-axis range.
important_notes.extraction_strategy: Extract data only where it exists, not the full x-axis range.
important_notes.x_axis_mapping: The full x-axis (36-620) maps to the full rotation range (0-80000), but data may end earlier.
